messages.subject: Re: empty nest
messages.msgSnippet: But I  like my own time a lot more now than I ever did. I have more books I want  to read, want to watch movies I choose, want to eat when and what I feel
messages.messageBody:
But I like my own time a lot
more now than I ever did. I have more books I want to read, want to
watch movies I choose, want to eat when and what I feel like eating,
and so on.


***You are so right Pam. A few years ago I went to a dance weekend by
myself and was camping. I was at a complete loss to know how much food to take.
How much food to I eat?? Do I need to use the bathroom?? It was so strange
to scale down, and be self-focused. For years I didn't let myself have
fiction in the house for me. I wasn't an attentive mom with my nose in the book,
and I couldn't seem to read just a little!! In these last few years I have
made up for that. A time, and a season----

Connie
_www.homeschoolingreflections.com_ (http://www.homeschoolingreflections.com)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
